    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Experiment to measure g</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment zu Maß g</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience à la mesure g</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência à medida g</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento alla misura g</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα στο μέτρο γ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento a la medida g</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up used to measure the value of the acceleration due to gravity g, using a card, weight, light gate and timer.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">timer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cards</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light gates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, die verwendet wird, um den Wert der Beschleunigung zu 
messen wegen Schwerkraft g mit einer Karte, einem Gewicht, einem 
hellen Gatter und einem Timer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale employée pour mesurer la valeur de l'accélération 
due à la pesanteur g, en utilisant une carte, un poids, une porte 
légère et un temporisateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental usada medir o valor do acceleration  devido à gravidade 
g, usando um cartão, um peso, uma porta clara e um temporizador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale usata per misurare il valore dell'accelerazione dovuto 
gravità g, usando una scheda, un peso, un cancello chiaro e un 
temporizzatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να μετρήσει την αξία της ταχύτητας λόγω στη 
βαρύτητα γ, χρησιμοποιώντας μια κάρτα, ένα βάρος, μια ελαφριά 
πύλη και ένα χρονόμετρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental usada para medir el valor de la aceleración  debido a la
gravedad g, usando una tarjeta, un peso, una puerta ligera y un 
temporizador.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Timer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
